name: Forest of Fear
description:
Forest of Fear is a found footage horror game

Created as part of GGJ 2023. Winner of judge's choice! 

The objective is to collect 4 items scattered throughout the map 

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Inspect item
  • Left Mouse - Pick up item

The most up-to-date and best experience can be had by downloading the Forest of Fear 2.0 version

If you wish to play the original game submitted for GGJ2023 please download the 1.0 version.
